name: Temple of the Four Serpents
description:
A tricky platformer set in a lost temple filled with puzzles and traps.

Legends speak of an ancient temple built deep in the South American jungle, dedicated to some lesser known serpent-like deities. What is well known, however, is the promise of a Golden Treasure hidden away in its deepest chamber. One night, one very dedicated explorer stumbles upon the temple…

Can you outsmart its deadly traps and many puzzles long enough to find the mythical Golden Treasure and escape the Temple of the Four Serpents?


CONTROLS

Arrow keys/WASD: move

Z/K/W/Up: jump

X/L: interact

P: pause

M: mute
